3. City Council Position 2

Vinay Singhania, City Council Position 2
========================================

Mr. Singhania moved to Lake Jackson from India in 1974.  He has been married to his wife, Christene (Esch) Singhania for 41 years and they have a son, Brian.  Mr. Singhania retired from the SI Group, Inc., after 41 years where he served as a Buyer Supervisor for their Freeport and Baytown sites.
Mr. Singhania currently serves as Liaison for the Planning Commission, Board of Health, Library Board and Lake Jackson EMS, Inc.  Mr. Singhania previously served on Lake Jackson City Council from 2006-2011 before he left office due to term limits.  He also previously served on the following City of Lake Jackson Boards and Commissions:
1985-1988  Animal Control Board
1988-1990  Keep Lake Jackson Beautiful Commission
1990-1998  Traffic Commission (2 years as Chairman)
1998-2006  Planning Commission
2011-2018  Planning Commission
Mr. Singhania was a member and volunteer for the Brazoswood Buc Band Booster Club from 2002-2006 (served as 2nd Vice President 2005-2006).  He served on the Board of Directors for Lake Jackson EMS from 2011-2018 (the last two years as Vice President and Vice Chairman of the board). He also currently serves as a member of the BISD Citizens' Bond Oversight Committee (since 2012).
